question:
Identify the temple with the help of given information:
  1. The Temple was built by Raja Raja Chola I in 1010 CE and is dedicated to Shiva
  2. The temple is part of the UNESCO World Heritage Site
  3. It is the is the world's first complete granite temple
   Select the correct answer from options given below:
explanation: Brihadeeswarar Temple is the world's first complete granite temple. The temple is part of the UNESCO World Heritage Site. It was built by Raja Raja Chola I in 1010 CE and is dedicated to Shiva.
